companyName: 重庆三峡水利电力(集团)股份有限公司
mainBusiness: 发电、供电、勘察设计安装、节水安装销售以及蒸汽销售。
actualController: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
location: 重庆市渝北区金开大道99号升伟晶石公元11栋,重庆市万州区高笋塘85号
chineseDescription: 重庆三峡水利电力(集团)股份有限公司的主营业务为发电、供电、勘察设计安装、节水安装销售以及蒸汽销售；公司为发供电一体的地方电力企业。投产的水电装机容量共计26.98万千瓦。公司供电区域覆盖重庆市万州区国土面积的80%,是三峡库区重要的电力负荷支撑点,为万州区社会经济发展和居民生产生活用电提供着重要的电力能源保障。

长江水利水电开发集团(湖北)有限公司

englishDescription: Chongqing Three Gorges Water Conservancy and Electric Power Co., Ltd. is a China-based company primarily engaged in the generation and supply of electric power. The Company mainly operates through electricity generation and distribution and electric power survey, design and installation businesses. Electricity Generation and Distribution segment generates electric power through hydro power and supplies electricity in regional areas. Electric Power Survey, Design and Installation segment provides power engineering construction consulting, survey and design, equipment installation and other technology and management services for engineering construction. The Company is also involves in the installation and sale of water-saving equipment, as well as the sale of steam. The Company operates its business mainly in Chongqing, Yunnan province and Sichuan province, China.
